AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'

WITH SEARCH AS (
SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, A.*, LEAD(A.SEQ, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC) AS NEXT_SEQ, LAG(A.SEQ, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY A.SEQ DESC) AS PRE_SEQ FROM PDS_BOARD A WHERE 1 = 1
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%'
AND (TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%' OR CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchText} || '%')
AND A.BOARD_TYPE = #{boardType} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
)
SELECT * FROM SEARCH WHERE 1=1 AND SEARCH.RNUM BETWEEN TO_NUMBER(#{pageNo}) * TO_NUMBER(#{pageSize}) - TO_NUMBER(#{pageSize}) + 1 AND TO_NUMBER(#{pageNo}) * TO_NUMBER(#{pageSize})
